participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

physical_activity1_y.Description: During the past 7 days, on how many days were you physically active for a total of at least 60 minutes per day? (Add up all the time you spent in any kind of physical activity that increased your heart rate and made you breathe hard some of the time) | 0 = 0 days; 1 = 1 day; 2 = 2 days; 3 = 3 days; 4 = 4 days; 5 = 5 days; 6 = 6 days; 7 = 7 days

physical_activity2_y.Description: On how many of the past 7 days did you do exercises to strengthen or tone your muscles, such as push-ups, sit-ups, or weight lifting? | 1 = 0 days; 2 = 1 day; 3 = 2 days; 4 = 3 days; 5 = 4 days; 6 = 5 days; 7 = 6 days; 8 = 7 days

physical_activity5_y.Description: In an average week when you are in school, on how many days do you go to physical education (PE) class? | 0 = 0 days; 1 = 1 day; 2 = 2 days; 3 = 3 days; 4 = 4 days; 5 = 5 days

physical_activity_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self-Administered ; 3=Combination [event_name_number] > '21'
